title: [Newydd oddiwrth y ser] [neu almanac am y flwyddyn 1686]
author: Jones, Thomas, 1648-1713.
notes: Title and imprint information from Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: title page and preliminaries lacking, faded and stained; best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
